content.raw:
Yes, you are right about `static` and `relative` fields.
I made a video for you to see why `inherit_yaw` is useful: https://youtu.be/2xzC5AADzqg
When following an aircraft, we find it more convenient when the camera inherits the yaw rotation of the visual. In other cases, this behaviour may not be desired, so that is why it can be disabled by setting `inherit_yaw` to false. The pitch and roll of the visual are always ignored.
